verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not, neither be thou <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>: <S%H3947>take<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with thee, and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%>: <S%H7200>see<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, and his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and his <S%H5892>city<s%>, and his <S%H776>land<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and her <S%H4428>king<s%> as thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> unto <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and her <S%H4428>king<s%>: only the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> thereof, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> thereof, shall ye take for a <S%H962>prey<s%> unto yourselves: <S%H7760>lay<s%> thee an <S%H693>ambush<s%> for the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> it.

¶ So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H5857>Ai<s%>: and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> chose <S%H977>out<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, and sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, ye shall lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%>, even <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>: <S%H7368>go<s%> not <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%>, but be ye all <S%H3559>ready<s%>:

And I, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are with me, will <S%H7126>approach<s%> unto the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and it shall come to pass, when they come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us, as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, that we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them,

(For they will come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> us) till we have <S%H5423>drawn<s%> them from the <S%H5892>city<s%>; for they will <S%H559>say<s%>, They <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>: therefore we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

Then ye shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> from the <S%H693>ambush<s%>, and <S%H3423>seize<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And it shall be, when ye have <S%H8610>taken<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, that ye shall <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>: according to the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%>. <S%H7200>See<s%>, I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

¶ <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> therefore sent them <S%H7971>forth<s%>: and they <S%H3212>went<s%> to lie in <S%H3993>ambush<s%>, and <S%H3427>abode<s%> between <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, on the west <S%H3220>side<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>: but <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%>, he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, even the people of <S%H4421>war<s%> that were with him, went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and drew <S%H5066>nigh<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> before the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> on the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>: now there was a <S%H1516>valley<s%> between them and <S%H5857>Ai<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> about <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> them to lie in <S%H693>ambush<s%> between <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, on the west <S%H3220>side<s%> of the <S%H5857%H5892>city<s%>.

And when they had <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, even all the <S%H4264>host<s%> that was on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and their liers in <S%H6119>wait<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, that they <S%H4116>hasted<s%> and rose up <S%H7925>early<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, he and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, at a time <S%H4150>appointed<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6160>plain<s%>; but he <S%H3045>wist<s%> not that there were liers in <S%H693>ambush<s%> against him <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> made as if they were <S%H5060>beaten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H5127>fled<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were in <S%H5857%H5892>Ai<s%> were <S%H2199>called<s%> together to <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them: and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and were drawn <S%H5423>away<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And there was not a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H5857>Ai<s%> or <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, that went not <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and they <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%>, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> after <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>spear<s%> that is in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward <S%H5857>Ai<s%>; for I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>. And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>spear<s%> that he had in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And the <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> out of their <S%H4725>place<s%>, and they <S%H7323>ran<s%> as soon as he had stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and they <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H4116>hasted<s%> and <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And when the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them, they <S%H7200>saw<s%>, and, behold, the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> ascended <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and they had no <S%H3027>power<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> this way or that <S%H2008>way<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> turned <S%H2015>back<s%> upon the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%>.

And when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H693>ambush<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and that the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%>, then they turned <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>.

And the <S%H428>other<s%> issued <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> them; so they were in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, some on this side, and some on that side: and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, so <S%H5704>that<s%> they <S%H7604>let<s%> none of them <S%H8300>remain<s%> or <S%H6412>escape<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> they <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%>, and <S%H7126>brought<s%> him to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2026>slaying<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> wherein they <S%H7291>chased<s%> them, and when they were all <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, until they were <S%H8552>consumed<s%>, that all the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And so it was, that all that <S%H5307>fell<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>, both of <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>, were <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, even all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>.

For <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>drew<s%> not his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%>, wherewith he stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>spear<s%>, until he had utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>.

Only the <S%H929>cattle<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> unto themselves, according unto the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, and <S%H7760>made<s%> it an <S%H8510>heap<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, even a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> on a <S%H6086>tree<s%> until <S%H6256%H6153>eventide<s%>: and as soon as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H935>down<s%>, <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> that they should <S%H3381>take<s%> his <S%H5038>carcase<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it at the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H6965>raise<s%> thereon a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>, that remaineth unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
¶ Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal<s%>,

As <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, over which no man hath lift <S%H5130>up<s%> any <S%H1270>iron<s%>: and they <S%H5927>offered<s%> thereon burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> there upon the <S%H68>stones<s%> a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, which he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and their <S%H2205>elders<s%>, and <S%H7860>officers<s%>, and their <S%H8199>judges<s%>, <S%H5975>stood<s%> on this side the <S%H727>ark<s%> and on that side before the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, which <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as well the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, as he that was <S%H249>born<s%> among them; <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal<s%>; as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H7223>before<s%>, that they should <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> he <S%H7121>read<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>, the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> and <S%H7045>cursings<s%>, according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>.

There was not a <S%H1697>word<s%> of all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, which <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> not before all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, with the <S%H802>women<s%>, and the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that were <S%H1980>conversant<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them.
